mapper.select:
SELECT `goods_name` AS goodsName, `id` AS goodsId, `icon` AS goodsIcon, `unit_price` AS goodsPrice, `extant` AS goodsExtant, `inventory` AS goodsInventory, `discount` AS goodsDiscount, `title` AS goodsTitle, `description` AS goodsDescription, `is_special` AS goodsIsSpecial, (SELECT `type_name` FROM `ic_util_goods_type` WHERE `id` = isg.`goods_class`) AS goodsClass, (SELECT `id` FROM `ic_shopping_util_price` WHERE `id` = isg.`util`) AS goodsUtil FROM `ic_shopping_goods` AS isg WHERE isg.`extant` > 0 AND (isg.`title` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') OR isg.`description` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') ) AND isg.`unit_price` >= #{beginPrice} AND isg.`unit_price` <= #{endPrice} AND isg.`goods_class` IN (SELECT `id` FROM `ic_util_goods_type` WHERE `type_name` = #{typeName}) ORDER BY isg.`unit_price`
desc
asc
limit #{off},#{end}
